div.h3: NYS school closures have been extended until at least May 15, 2020

p.span: Governor Cuomo announced that NY PAUSE, which has restricted all non-essential businesses from operating, will be extended until at least May 15th. School districts will be prohibited from opening until at least this time. All activities and events scheduled at our buildings during this time are cancelled or will be postponed. All Farmingdale School District outdoor facilities (playgrounds, fields, and tracks) are also closed.

div.span: Visit our Coronavirus webpage for the latest district developments. https://www.farmingdaleschools.org/resources/coronavirus

div.p: At Farmingdale School District, teachers and students are given the tools for personalized learning and the ability to achieve a level of rigorous instruction, which prepares students for an ever-changing global society.
